mapper.select: SELECT sum(t.amount * t.volume) ) FROM sales t WHERE t.txTime between '2022-11-01 00:00:00' and '2022-12-01 00:00:00'
select t.name, count(t.name) as value from sales t where t.tx_time between '2022-11-01 00:00:00' and '2022-12-01 00:00:00' group by t.name order by value desc LIMIT 5

select date_format(t.tx_time, '%m/%d') as time , sum(t.amount*t.volume)/1000 as amount from mydb.sales t where date_format(t.tx_time, '%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB('2022-12-01', INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') group by time;
select date_format(t.tx_time, '%m/%d') as time , sum(t.amount*t.volume)/1000 as amount from mydb.sales t where YEARWEEK(date_format(t.tx_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK('2022-12-01')-1 group by time;
select date_format(t.tx_time, '%m/%d') as time , sum(t.amount*t.volume) as amount from sales t where t.tx_time between '2022-11-01 00:00:00' and '2022-12-01 00:00:00' group by time;
select date_format(t.tx_time, '%m/%d') as time , count(date_format(t.tx_time,'%m/%d')) as amount from sales t where t.tx_time between '2022-11-01 00:00:00' and '2022-12-01 00:00:00' group by time;
select cpname as name, count(cpname) as value from mydb.sales t where t.tx_time between '2022-11-01 00:00:00' and '2022-12-01 00:00:00' group by cpname order by value desc limit 5
select count(*) as amount from sales t where DATE(t.tx_time) = current_date()
